hero.findInfo: Here you can find some information about how to help or how to GET help in Berlin, Germany or beyond. Please check our website regularly, the content is getting updated on a daily basis
hero.helping: If you are interested in helping to develop the website or have useful links, please contact through links on the bottom (instagram, telegram)
hero.telephone: Central, official phone number for Ukrainian refugees (in RUS and UKR):
hero.arrival: go there after arrival into Berlin
hero.cityInfo: Berlin City info in GER, UKR, RUS
hero.questionnaires: Here are direct links to questionnaires to fill out (directly from unterkunft-ukraine.de)
hero.links: Here links to Telegram Groups in Berlin

rotary.title: Rotary Club Accomodation
rotary.text: Place to offer and look for accomodation in Europe, initiated by Rotary Club Berlin & International

ostauschuss.title: Job Portal
ostauschuss.text: Search engine by 'Ostauschuss Der deutschen Wirtschaft' for jobs in Germany offered to ukrainian refugees, mainly IT

ministry.title: Commissioner for Migration
ministry.text: Website of the Commissioner of the Federal Government for Migration and Refugees, step by step information of how to take first steps in Germany (GER, ENG, UKR)

shelter.title: Ukraine Take Shelter
shelter.text: Looking for accomodation? Offering one? Just enter your city and find or offer place to stay (many languages)

germany4ukraine.title: Germany 4 Ukraine
germany4ukraine.text: Official website from the Federal Ministry of the Interior, most recent and exact information available (UKR, ENG, GER)

registerBerlin.title: Registration in Berlin
registerBerlin.text: Instructions step by step on how to register as an Ukrainian refugee in Berlin (in German)

krisenchat.title: Krisenchat for Children
krisenchat.text: Whatsapp or SMS: free psychological counseling for children provided by krisenchat.de from Berlin RUS + UKR

jameda.title: Ukrainian speaking doctors
jameda.text: Search engine for doctors and medical staff that speaks Ukrainian or Russian

okopress.title: Article about help in Poland
okopress.text: Tips in Ukrainian and Polish about help provided in Poland

commission.title: European Commission Info
commission.text: Comprehensive and complex information in Ukrainian for refugees seeking asylum in Europe provided by European Commission, with interactive map

united.title: United for Ukraine
united.text: Website offering help with accomodation, legal issues and psychological support in many european countries

yevropi.title: Yevropi.com
yevropi.text: Portal for free housing in Europe open to all Ukrainian refugees

adiuto.title: Adiuto.org
adiuto.text: Comprehensive list of needed products for Berlin Hauptbahnhof, Berlin Ostbahnhof, Berlin ZOB (for donation)

iHelpYou.title: I Help You app
iHelpYou.text: New App that connects people in crisis times, for Ukraine.

featuresTiles.title: HOW CAN YOU HELP
featuresTiles.paragraph: There is plenty of links here

googleMaps.title: Donate in Berlin
googleMaps.text: Places where you can go with your donation in Berlin on Google Maps

telegram.title: Join Telegram Group
telegram.text: Click on the image to join the Telegram group for Ukrainians that look for accommodation in Berlin

warmesBett.title: Warmes-Bett.de
warmesBett.text: Offers warm beds for refugees, search engine, in German

berlinHilft.title: Berlin Hilft
berlinHilft.text: Berlin Helps, collaboration for refugees, some info also in Ukrainian

gynecologist.title: Gynecologist
gynecologist.text: Ukrainian speaking Gynecologist in Berlin that offers help, link for FB

mitOst.title: MitOst e.V.
mitOst.text: Organization that collects donations for Ukraine

wunderflats.title: Accomodation in Germany Wunderflats (link in UKR)
wunderflats.text: Wunderflats is a big company offering short term apartments. Most of the offers are for free, many under 500€ per month

telegramMunich.title: Telegram group Munich
telegramMunich.text: Click on the image to join the Telegram group for Ukrainians that look for accomodation in Munich (München)

shelterUA.title: Shelter for Ukraine
shelterUA.text: New website for shelters, both for those who seek and those who offer

unterkunftUkraine.title: Unterkunft Ukraine
unterkunftUkraine.text: Berlin based website for housing - both offers and requests. In co-operation with GLS Bank and Ecosia, probably data protection compliant

polishHomes.title: Polish Homes
polishHomes.text: Provisional map of homes offering accommodation IN POLAND

ukraineHelpBerlin.title: Ukraine Help Berlin
ukraineHelpBerlin.text: Website of Berlin organization for Ukrainian people, with loads of resources

pomagamUkrainie.title: Pomagam Ukrainie
pomagamUkrainie.text: Polish government website for both those who want to help and those who need help (UKRAINIAN LANGUAGE)

ukrainaServices.title: Ukraina Services
ukrainaServices.text: Website in Polish, English and Ukrainian summarizing possibilities available in Poland

documentUkrainian.title: Document in Ukrainian
documentUkrainian.text: 15 pages of a document in Ukrainian language with all important information for refugees

lawHelp.title: Lawyer's help
lawHelp.text: If you are looking for legal advice

telegramParis.title: Paris Telegram
telegramParis.text: Join the Telegram Group for helpers in Paris, France

officialInformationUkrainianCitizens.title: Official Information for Ukrainian Citizens
officialInformationUkrainianCitizens.text: Website from Berlin City in German, English and Ukrainian providing information about current rules and help offered by state and city itself

polishWebsiteRefugees.title: Polish website for Ukrainian Refugees
polishWebsiteRefugees.text: Available in both Polish and Ukrainian. For those in Poland and Ukraine, who want to help and need help

healthCentreRefugees.title: Health Centre for Refugees
healthCentreRefugees.text: Go-to place for psychological help dedicated to refugees. Website in German
